headline: Evercore ISI Raises PT on Western Digital Corporation (WDC), Keeps a Buy Rating
summary: ​Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) is one of the Hottest Large-Cap Stocks to Buy Now. On October 13, Amit Daryanani from Evercore ISI raised the firm’s price target on Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) from $85 to $190, while keeping an outperform rating on the stock. ​The analyst noted that the Hard Disk Drive industry is expected […]

headline: Can Western Digital’s (WDC) New AI Lab Transform Its Competitive Edge in Storage Solutions?
summary: Western Digital recently announced the opening of its expanded 25,600 square foot System Integration and Test Lab in Rochester, designed to accelerate qualification and delivery of high-capacity storage products as artificial intelligence applications drive increased storage needs. This facility enables Western Digital engineers and customers to collaborate throughout the product lifecycle, supporting rapid innovation and reliable performance for demanding AI and cloud workloads. We'll...
